title: Strictly Michelle Visage's sprawling Californian home with walk-in dressing room
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Michelle Visage has given fans a glimpse into the stunning house in California she shares with her family and pooches.

The 51-year-old Strictly star lives with her husband, David Case, and their daughters Lillie, 19, and Lola, 17, and their two dogs Romeo and Daisy.

The fancy abode looks perfect for glamazon Michelle, who also stars as a judge on Ru Paul's Drag Race.

In photos uploaded to her Instagram , Michelle revealed her living room features teal-coloured walls matched with a huge fluffy rug which spreads across the room.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Below the wall-mounted flat screen TV, she has a classic homely fireplace with a mantle piece adorned with silver and grey stars, a fragrance diffuser, and lettering that spelt out "JOY".

Also visible is a portrait of Michelle alongside her catchphrase from Drag Race: "Stop relying on that body."

On the silver sofa sleeps one of Michelle's cute dogs - showing she is not too glamorous to have her dogs cuddle up on the sofa beside her.

(Image: Instagram)

In another photo where Michelle is plugging her bedazzled glasses, her dressing room can be seen.

On the shelf are several pairs of high heels, and very sparkly clothes poke out of a wardrobe beside them.

And Michelle takes a leaf out of Ru Paul's book, as a wig stand can also be spotted and a black hairpiece dangles off one of the cabinets.

In another photo Michelle took of her dog, there is an ornate patterned rug under the gold deluxe padded chair with a matching table.

And in yet another one (Michelle loves her dogs) her pooch lounges on a huge brown leather sofa with removable padding.

Michelle's home life is clearly lower maintenance than her usually glamorous persona, as her pup has gone to town messing up the sofa cushions and looks a bit guilty for it.

(Image: Instagram)

Videos from Michelle's Insta stories show she has French doors which go all the way up to the ceiling.

The windows overlook her huge grassy back garden where her dogs can play.

Michelle's kitchen is a similar teal tone to her living room, and features a traditional gas cooker, cream coloured cabinets and a fridge with touching family snaps.
description: The Strictly Come Dancing star has given us an insight into her huge extravagant home she shares with her family and beloved pups
